Text.CA: He vist com Gnorck s'emportava la teva barca.
Text.EN: I have seen how gnorkc took your boat.

Text.CA: Crec que Topete pot ajudar-te a reparar-la.
Text.EN: I think Topete can help you repairing it.

Text.CA: Per√≤ un arbre va caure al pont i no podem passar.
Text.EN: But a tree fell on the bridge and we can't get through.
